data: Android has his own UI library :) so you need to write the code with the android UI standard you cannot use swing or awt in android UI :) For more details about android and java this is a important information you need to know The difference between Dalvik Virtual Machine and Java Virtual Machine and youll get the all the points .
I think Alex B is right when he says that objectively the API is bad and could have been better.
Its more a performance patch for Java 1.4 than a UI framework.
